title: Charles Sofa Black /LEFT CHAISE
body: Available in left and right hand chaise, this sofa combines clean lines and slender proportions in a sleek, contemporary design with pillow back cushions.Narrow arms create a larger seating area, without adding to the footprint, while modern, slim metal legs give the design a sleek look.This streamlined sofa ticks all the boxes in terms of comfort, quality and design
